welcome_message_body: "Welcome to University Park, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, vibrant culture, and world-renowned universities. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that this wonderful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Love Field Airport houses all domestic flights and is home to various amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Legend Terminal
terminals.description: The Legend Terminal at Love Field Airport is primarily used for private and charter flights, as well as some commercial flights for select airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access the internet.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redbird Airport handles all commercial flights and has a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Redbird Airport caters to private and chartered flights, offering a more exclusive and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The largest terminal at DFW, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A medium-sized terminal that serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: The international terminal at DFW, with flights to destinations around the world.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: A small terminal that primarily serves American Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Terminal F
terminals.description: The newest terminal at DFW, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Arlington Municipal Airport serves all commercial flights and houses various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Arlington Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing exclusive services for passengers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Addison Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Addison Airport is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
